Package view

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
view.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoginMenu, WelcomeMenu
public class Menu extends Object implements Displayable
Base class for all user interface elements with actionable selections.
Since:
2023-11-09

    • display

      public void display()
      Clears stdout and displays prompt and selections to stdout. Gets user selection choice and executes the action of the selected item.
      Specified by:
      display in interface Displayable
